title: David Bonan | Blog
description: David Bonan - Senior developer, entrepreneur, and general technology enthusiast

items.title: AI-Assisted Legacy Migration: Lessons Learned
items.summary: A retrospective on using AI tools intensively for a large codebase migration, from initial failures to a workflow that actually works.

items.title: Boosting Performance with Web Workers
items.summary: Learn how to leverage Web Workers to run CPU-intensive tasks without blocking the main thread in JavaScript applications.

items.title: Building a Mobile App with AI: A Journey from Concept to App Store
items.summary: A real-world experience of using AI tools like Cursor and Claude to build a mobile application from scratch, highlighting both benefits and challenges.

items.title: Claude Code vs Cursor: A Monorepo Showdown
items.summary: A real-world comparison of Claude Code and Cursor when building complex features in a large monorepo, exploring their strengths and limitations.

items.title: Debugging Slow SQL Server Queries: A Developer's Practical Guide
items.summary: Learn how to systematically identify and optimize slow SQL Server queries using execution plans, profiling tools, and proven techniques.

items.title: Effective Code Reviews: Beyond Nitpicking
items.summary: Transform your code review process from a bottleneck into a valuable team practice that improves code quality and knowledge sharing.

items.title: Leveraging TypeScript Advanced Types: Practical Uses Beyond Basics
items.summary: How to use TypeScript's advanced type features to solve real-world problems and create more maintainable codebases.

items.title: Mastering JavaScript Data Structures: Beyond Arrays
items.summary: Learn how choosing the right data structure in JavaScript can significantly improve your code performance and readability.

items.title: Optimizing React Performance: A Practical Guide
items.summary: Learn practical techniques to identify and fix performance bottlenecks in your React applications.

items.title: Solving N² Complexity with JavaScript Maps
items.summary: Learn how to transform inefficient nested loops into performant solutions using JavaScript Maps.

items.title: Why Unit Tests Can Harm Your Codebase and Prevent Refactoring
items.summary: Learn why over-testing intermediate methods can lead to rigid code and how to make better decisions about what to test.

items.title: Migration Legacy Assistée par IA : Retour d'expérience
items.summary: Une rétrospective de l'utilisation intensive des outils IA pour une migration d'une large codebase, des échecs initiaux à un workflow qui fonctionne réellement.
